name: The CyberZapper
description:
Zap into the network ! The CyberZapper, game done for the Ludum Dare 51.

Play a rebel pirate and hack into this military training program ! You have this unique ability to Zapp into other areas, use this to escape before they catch you.

You can do this every 10 seconds !

Use WASD or ZQSD to move + Mouse to Target and Shoot + SPACE to ZAPP !

Good luck Zapper !
